item.title: Data Structures, Abstractions, Time Complexity and Speed
item.description: A better time complexity does not mean faster. In this article we look at various abstractions such as Sets and Maps in different languages (and in Redis).

item.title: Ruby Symbol to Proc explained, the short version
item.description: What does an ampersand followed by a symbol as an argument to a ruby method actually do? It creates a proc.

item.title: TIL CLI
item.description: A small cli available as a ruby gem to maintain a repo of TILs
